name: @dddforum/backend
description: A basic typescript app starter for 2023.

scripts.start:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging dddforumBuildTools migrate -o ./src/shared/persistence/prisma/schema.prisma && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dddforumBuildTools prepareEnv -d ./docker-compose.yml -o ./src/shared/persistence/prisma/schema.prisma && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon
